adviseScripts.text: Hey, Teacher!
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: What do you think I should do
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: when I'm not feeling up to going to school?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: It's okay to skip class once in a while, but don't make it a habit.
You're a third-year student now, so set an example for the younger ones.
Really?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Hmm... now that you mention it,
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: skipping class doesn't seem so appealing.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: A model senior student never skips class!
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: I know, but...
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: is it really so bad to skip just one day?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Even Naru agrees.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Rei and I have a discussion about school.
*Sob*
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Teacher... Naru... Naru...!
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Did Naru steal your snacks?
Did Naru refuse to let you listen to music?
*Sob* Yes...
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: I didn't take it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Naru 1

adviseScripts.text: Stop lying!
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Teacher, please tell Naru off!
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: That was my one and only snack!
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: *Hiccup* I'm not crying over that!
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Naru ate my snack.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: I didn't take it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Naru 1

adviseScripts.text: You're lying! That was my one and only snack... *Sniffle*
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: *Whimper* Ah-choo!
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: I buy Rei some delicious snacks and spend some time with her.
Whoa, Teacher, you're like a giant!
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: I wish I could be as tall as you someday.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Do you have any tips?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: That's not possible for someone like you.
Drink milk every day and you might grow taller.
What?!
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: That's so mean, Teacher!
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Don't underestimate me!
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: But I hate plain milk.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: How about chocolate milk?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: I could guzzle down 10 cartons a day.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Rei and I do some research on how to grow taller.
Now that I'm in my third year...
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: I wanna be a super cool senior.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: What's the secret to being a great one?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: You already are a great senior, Rei.
Quit snacking for good.
Hehehe.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Hehehehe.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: You really think so, Teacher?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: I daresay Ein and Zwei feel the same way.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: What do snacks have to do with that anyway?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: ... You don't have a clue about how to be a super cool senior, do you?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: I'll ask Ein and Zwei instead.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: I discuss about what it takes to be a super cool senior with Rei.
I got a test back today.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: I think I did pretty well.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Teacher, did you do well on tests back in your days?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: I did better than you.
I was the valedictorian.
How do you know that, Teacher?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Don't tell me... my report card is out already?!
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: ... What's my score? Can you give me a sneak peek?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: All of them wear expressions of disbelief.
Guys, say something. Don't make Teacher nervous!
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: I believe you, Teacher!
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: You're so inspiring!
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: I have a chat about exams with Rei.
... Are you feeling down due to puberty?
Give her a piece of sweet chocolate.
No, not really.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: I just don't feel myself today.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Perhaps some sweets will lift my spirits...
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: You sure you don't want it?
I want it! Thank you, Teacher!
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Hehe. It looks even more delectable when it's from you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Rei and I savor some chocolates together and have a lovely time.
Naru and I will always have your back, Teacher!
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: We won't let anyone mess with you!
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: So, what do you think? Am I reliable?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Absolutely reliable.
I'll protect you.
Yes!
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: That's what senior students are supposed to be, right?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: You can always count on me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: No, no, no! I'm a senior student now.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: It's my job to protect you, Teacher!
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: I spend some meaningful time with Rei.
Teacher, the weather is lovely. Shall we take a stroll together?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: We can indulge in all sorts of treats while we're out.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Plus, we can jam to some tunes!
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: You can't play music in public places.
What kind of snacks should we get?
I don't see the harm in playing music where there's no one else around.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Hmm... You're right. I can't act like I own the public space.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Can we still have some snacks, though?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: We can buy any snacks we want? I want some chocolates and candies!
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Can I choose different types?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Rei and I have a delightful conversation.
Emperor penguins hate spinach♪ Ooh la la♪
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Too much fish and now my tummy aches♪ Ooh la la♪
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: You should try eating spinach too.
Emperor penguins hate spinach♪ Ooh la la♪
What? But I'm just singing a song.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: And are you sure spinach is necessary for me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Eating spinach can make you grow taller.
... I'll be adding spinach to my diet from now on.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Wow, I didn't know you could sing so well, Teacher!
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Hehe, how do you like my song?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: It's my favorite one.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: I sing along with Rei and enjoy a fun time with her.
Ahh...
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Teacher, my teeth are throbbing.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Let's get you to a dentist.
No more snacks for you from now on.
To the dentist?!
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: But I don't want to...
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Rei, you're a big girl.
... All right, I'll be brave and set a good example.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: I'm not scared of dentists at all!
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: No, Teacher! It's not that bad.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: I was just overreacting... ouch!
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: I take Rei to the dentist for a check-up.
Teacher, check out what I brought! Snacks!
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Wanna try some?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: No thanks, I'm not hungry.
Sure thing, hand 'em over.
Oh... All right then,
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: I'll just eat 'em all myself!
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Nom nom nom.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Here you go.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Rei snatches the snack out of Naru's mouth and passes it to me.
Ew, there's Naru's saliva on it. But don't freak out! It's not technically saliva, so it's still edible.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Rei and I then launch into a debate about the greatest snack ever made.
Wouldn't it be amazing if Naru could do my homework for me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: I mean, it's a great idea, don't you think?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Yeah, that would be awesome.
So you haven't done your homework yet?
That's what I'm saying! That way, I could...
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Naru could entertain your friends in your place.
Huh?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: And Naru will wield the power of a third-year student on your behalf.
What?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Eventually, Naru would take over your entire life.
I'm going to do my homework now.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Not yet.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Because the day isn't over.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: I'm going to start now.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: I stay with Rei and help her with her homework.
*Huff* *Huff*
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Ein...! How dare she...! *Huff*
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: That's completely unacceptable!
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Did Ein tell you to shape up as a senior?
Did Ein ask you to clean the window frames?
No, it's not about that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: But how could Ein say something like that...! Argh!
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: She's really getting on my nerves!
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: ... Wait, do I seem like an incompetent senior to you?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: That's right!
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: But cleaning the window frames is not a big deal.
It's true but...
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Ein was being disrespectful and even snickering!
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: I comfort Rei for a while.
Teacher, I have a question.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: What makes an ideal senior student?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: You know, someone who can command respect and admiration for a long time.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Someone who treats others to meals and snacks.
Someone who isn't like Rei.
Treating others to meals and snacks, huh? Let me jot that down.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Hmm, I need to check my allowance this month...
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Okay, got it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Maybe I'll have to hold off on it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Just kidding.
Rei and I explore the attributes of an exceptional senior student.
These days, juniors are so disrespectful.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: They act like they're in charge and never follow instructions.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: *Sigh* I wasn't like that when I was their age.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: How did you behave as a junior, Rei?
Juniors these days need to be put in their place.
Well, I used to argue a lot with those senior students.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: But I had a good reason for it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Anyway, I'm not like them.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: ... I see.
Exactly!
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: ... Uh, come to think of it,
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: I might have been the same way when I was a junior.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Perhaps this is just the prevailing trend among students in that grade?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Rei shares her struggles of managing her juniors with me.
Ein and Zwei are the best.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Hehe. You know why?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Because they're your personal snack and homework assistants?
Because they could keep you on your toes?
Yes, that's exactly what they do!
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Ein always knows what I'm craving,
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: and Zwei helps me with my assignments without even being asked.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Why should I be?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: I'm already a perfect senior student, you know.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: I don't really need that kind of help.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: I listen to Rei praise her juniors.
Teacher, which one of the Narus do you prefer?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: This is 1, this is 2, and this is 3.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Honestly, they all look the same to me.
Naru 3...?
Beep!
adviseScripts.speaker: Naru 1

adviseScripts.text: Creak!
adviseScripts.speaker: Naru 2

adviseScripts.text: Pfft!
adviseScripts.speaker: Naru 3

adviseScripts.text: ... Sorry, my bad.
Hehe. I see.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Naru 3 also has a fondness for you, Teacher.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: I listen to Rei praise Naru 1, 2, and 3.
Battles aren't really my thing.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: They're a bit daunting.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: How about you, Teacher?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: I find them a bit scary too.
It's fine once I got used to them.
So you also have a bit of fear, Teacher.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: But you carry on with it because...
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: it's worth the risk, right?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: So you could gradually build up your courage.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: I don't think I'll ever be brave enough like you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: I provide some comfort to Rei about her concerns.
... I got screwed.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: I didn't expect a pop quiz!
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: And it's the subject I'm worst at.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Are you going to clean the bathroom starting tomorrow?
I bet you still did pretty well, right?
Teacher, can I ask you for a favor?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: I won't be scrubbing any toilets for you.
... Okay.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Hehe.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Let's just say I didn't let it defeat me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Even though I flunked the quiz, I still feel like I won mentally.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Rei and I talk about strategies for tackling pop quizzes.
Teacher! Here!
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Rei holds out her clenched fist.
I got something for you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Accept her gift.
Decline her gift.
Rei opens her hand to reveal a candy.
I managed to chance upon this incredibly rare candy and held it tightly in my hand to bring to you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: It may not be the best-tasting candy, but it's definitely a rare treat.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Thank you, Rei.
Teacher, what's wrong? You have a guilty look on your face.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: You don't want it?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Uh... Why?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: This candy is really unique...
adviseScripts.speaker: Rei

adviseScripts.text: Rei and I play rock, paper, scissors for a while.
